thread.section_title: Gà Nướng Ò Ó O - Lê Văn Sỹ ở TP. HCM | Foody.vn
thread.title: Meet expectation! | Victoria Tien
thread.title_full: Gà Nướng Ò Ó O - Lê Văn Sỹ ở TP. HCM | Bình luận - Meet expectation! | Victoria Tien | Foody.vn

posts.title: Meet expectation! | Victoria Tien
posts.text: Meet expectation! During our trip to Vietnam, we stopped by this restaurant by following foody reviews. This is a typical vietnamese restaurant located in the alley, which car can drive to easily. Their main course is grilled chicken with different marinated sauces. You can order whole chicken or half depend on how much you can eat. We ordered a half grilled chicken with spicy sauce, one of their popular dishes here (but forgot to take pictures, opps!!), and sticky rice, kimchi. The chicken came with two different dipping sauces. One was spicy sour sauce; one was like BBQ sauce (but Vietnamese flavor). The spicy sour sauce was my favorite. Overall, the chicken was very tasty, moist and favorable. The price is very reasonable as well. We paid $180k for the whole meal and we were comfortably full. The only down side for this restaurant is it does not have enough light, even though it was 2pm in the afternoon; and the restroom is sketchy. So far I would recommend this restaurant for my friends. ...Xem thêm

thread.section_title: Chiyoda Sushi V Lotus ở TP. HCM | Foody.vn
thread.title: Overrated Sushi in Ho Chi Minh City | Huy
thread.title_full: Chiyoda Sushi V Lotus ở TP. HCM | Bình luận - Overrated Sushi in Ho Chi Minh City | Huy | Foody.vn

posts.title: Overrated Sushi in Ho Chi Minh City | Huy
posts.text: Overrated Sushi in Ho Chi Minh City Biggest scam sushi Ive came across in Ho Chi Minh City is this place, the sashimi wasnt fresh, although the place is nice. But dont let the pictures deceive you, make sure you ask them before making the order, dont do what i just did, order it straight out of the menu. The so call Sumiyaki Hitokuchi Beef steek may look like a chunk of marbles piece of wagyu but its not what it seem, it turn out to be just a regular piece of tenderlon steek. This place is overrated and for the price you would expected a little better sushi & so call the japanese beef. ...Xem thêm

thread.section_title: Japanit Matcha & Coffee House ở TP. HCM | Foody.vn
thread.title: Bad experience ever! Plz don't ever come to this restaurant! | Karen Pham
thread.title_full: Japanit Matcha & Coffee House ở TP. HCM | Bình luận - Bad experience ever! Plz don't ever come to this restaurant! | Karen Pham | Foody.vn

posts.title: Bad experience ever! Plz don't ever come to this restaurant! | Karen Pham
posts.text: Bad experience ever! Plz don't ever come to this restaurant! We came here to try the matcha products that they advertised on FB. However, we ordered a Matcha Cheese Cake, then they brought our cake to the other table and after 10 minutes, they came and asked us if we got our order complete (absolutely not complete cause our cake was at the other table) Then the server came to that table, grabbed the cake then brought it to us even though it was sitting there collectting other people's germ for the past 10 minutes. He simply said: 'they' (aka the other customers) havent touched the cake yet!!! I then requested to get another piece of cake cuz i simply don't want others' saliva on it. The waiter grabbed the cake in then after a few minutes brought me the supposedly 'new' piece. Needless to say, I'm not too dumb to realize that was the same plate they brought out earlier. You can see the pic for yourselves. I did not come to make a scene. But the service spoke for itself. I loved the matcha crepe just as much as my wife did but we will not ever come back to this place for the reason above. Server đem lộn order qua bàn khác. Để cả 10 phút mình thì cứ ngồi ngóng. Lúc sau chạy tới hỏi xem mình xong order chưa mới phát hiện ra lỗi sai. Không có 1 lời xin lỗi. Chạy qua bàn kia chụp cái dĩa bánh matcha cheese cake đem qua. Nói ngon ơ: anh chị ơi cái dĩa này khách chưa ăn!!! Gì vậy trời!!! Tui bực quá nói vô làm dĩa khác. Cái xách vô rồi xách ra lại dĩa đó. Nhìn hình coi, dĩa hồi nãy mà. Tui đâu có khùng đâu. Mới uống ly trà xanh còn tỉnh lắm mà mấy bạn?!! Nói chung tui ko có tiếc gì. Ko ăn cũng được. Nhưng mà mấy bạn làm cho có tâm chút chớ. Sai thì phải nhận lỗi rồi vô làm dĩa khác cho khách chớ lỗi phải cũng ko nhận còn làm lấp liếm vậy?! Tui sẽ ko bao giờ bước chân vô quán này nữa!!! ...Xem thêm

thread.section_title: Oromia Coffee - Nam Kỳ Khởi Nghĩa ở TP. HCM | Foody.vn
thread.title: Amazing Smoothie and Salad | Rosie N
thread.title_full: Oromia Coffee - Nam Kỳ Khởi Nghĩa ở TP. HCM | Bình luận - Amazing Smoothie and Salad | Rosie N | Foody.vn

posts.title: Amazing Smoothie and Salad | Rosie N
posts.text: Amazing Smoothie and Salad I really enjoyed this cafe! Right as you step towards the door you'll be greeted by a plethora of coy fishes. IMO there's a few too many, it seemed a bit crowded in the pond. Oromia's decor is woodbased and has lots of plants. They have 2 floors so there is plenty of seating. The service was prompt and the waiters were friendly. They also have a piano on the 2nd floor for customers to share their musical talent. I highly recommend the green tea-banana smoothie and Fruit Salad (dressed with a beautiful mango purée). The two paired made a very satisfying healthy lunch. ...Xem thêm

thread.title: Tokyo Deli - Lê Thánh Tôn | n ns
thread.title_full: Tokyo Deli Lê Thánh Tôn - Món Ngon Nhật Bản Giá Cả Phải Chăng ở TP. HCM | Bình luận - Tokyo Deli - Lê Thánh Tôn | n ns | Foody.vn

posts.title: Tokyo Deli - Lê Thánh Tôn | n ns
posts.text: Tokyo Deli - Lê Thánh Tôn I don’t understand how this restaurant has managed to stay afloat. Within the first 30 minutes, the waiter has already wrongly recorded my food. We then had to wait another 40 minutes before anyone got back to us because they were overwhelmed with the amount of people that were dining that day. If you can’t manage your time and employees how can you be a working restaurant. The sashimi and rolls were bland and was lacking in colour and taste. The seaweed salad was drowning in vinegar and sugar. Disappointed. ...Xem thêm

thread.section_title: 38 Flower Market & Tea House - Nguyễn Công Trứ ở TP. HCM | Foody.vn
thread.title: 1st time | Rooney NGUYEN
thread.title_full: 38 Flower Market & Tea House - Nguyễn Công Trứ ở TP. HCM | Bình luận - 1st time | Rooney NGUYEN | Foody.vn

posts.title: 1st time | Rooney NGUYEN
posts.text: 1st time New 38degree flower market Tea house is in town, on Nguyen Cong Tru street. Heard that much bigger and more beautiful than Pham Ngoc Thach branch. We love the way they design the place combine flower market and tea house. Wonderful and ideal place for photographer and photo lovers. Prices are quite reasonable for drinks and foods because I think they earn profits more from flower market than tea house. Delicious tea and cookies.... Will come back for more.... P/S: people with professional cameras can only use them for 20 minutes. ...Xem thêm

thread.title_full: El Sol - Meat & Wine - Võ Thị Sáu ở TP. HCM | Bình luận - Oh wow! The worst rib eye steak ive ever had... | foodee_mkodxiaw | Foody.vn

posts.title: Oh wow! The worst rib eye steak ive ever had... | foodee_mkodxiaw
posts.text: Oh wow! The worst rib eye steak ive ever had... The 580,000D = $25.54 usd rib eye steak that i just had is so terrible! Its s chewy, over cooked and burn! Ive eaten many places in VN but the steak here are not worth the money or trying... save your money and try Pho or something else. Not to mention my wife tender sirloin is so chewy i have to force the knives down to cut it.... Thats just not steak, more like a hard working cow that they butcher... ...Xem thêm

posts.title: Fantastic | Grace™
posts.text: Fantastic ✔️their Locations is OK, easy to find but hard to park. ✔️Decoration is beautiful, good for checkin and enjoy. It really goes with the good. ✔️Foods are fantastic. They offer so many choices of good traditional Cantonese or Chinese foods. ❌service is not really satisfied. Waitresses are rude somehow when you don't wear nice outfit though! ❌prices are pretty much high. Therefore their customers are usually foreigners. My experience was really good and i will probably come back! ...Xem thêm
